column4: anyone here willing to dig into some routing issues for me? all im trying to do is route the traffic from my pptp vpn connection labeled ppp0 to my atheros wireless card ath0 ifconfig shows ppp0 so i should be connected at least as far as that goes
if someone would like to help me with my issue above please pm me i will be right back. :)
you can dig google by yourself.. if you are up to it :)
